subject: Communication
title: The Power of Paraphrasing
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Power of Paraphrasing.

hook.text: 'So what you're saying is...' â€” six words that transform a conversation.

buildup.text: Paraphrasing restates the speaker's message in your own words. It verifies understanding and shows genuine engagement.

discovery.text: Negotiation research shows that paraphrasing increases agreement rates by 30%.

twist.text: Parroting (repeating exact words) isn't paraphrasing. Effective paraphrasing captures the meaning and emotion.

climax.text: Paraphrasing also helps the listener. Restating ideas in your own words deepens your own comprehension and memory of.

punchline.text: Repeat their words and they feel heard. Restate their meaning and they feel.
